snippet: There are some defensive deals in which many make what appear to be textbook plays, not realizing that they are erring.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played at the Spring Nationals in Memphis.
lead_paragraph: There are some defensive deals in which many make what appear to be textbook plays, not realizing that they are erring.

headline.seo: Bridge — At Spring Nationals, ‘Right’ Play in Wrong Deal
headline.main: At Spring Nationals, ‘Right’ Play in Wrong Deal
